==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=叶}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|艸|枼|c1=s|c2=p|t1=grass|t2=flat|ls=psc}}.

===Etymology===
From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*s-lap||leaf}}. Cognate with {{cog|bo|ལོ་མ||leaf}}, Western {{cog|bo|ལོབ་མ||leaf}}. Related to {{och-l|世|world}}.

This is part of the word family *''lVp'' meaning “flat”, represented by the phonetic component {{och-l|枼}}. Compare also {{och-l|茶|tea < *leaf}}.

===Etymology 1===
<div style="float:right;">
{{wikipedia|lang=ja}}
{{wikipedia|Leaf}}
[[File:Leavessnipedale.jpg|thumb|250px|{{lang|ja|葉}} (''ha'', ''yō''): sunlight through '''[[leaf|leaves]]'''.]]
</div>
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|は}}
{{IPAchar|/pa/}} → {{IPAchar|/fa/}} → {{IPAchar|/ha/}}

From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=は}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref> Probably cognate with {{etyl|ojp|-}} verb {{m|ja|生ゆ|tr=hayu||to sprout, to grow}} → modern {{m|ja|生える|tr=haeru}}, and with {{m|ja|羽|tr=ha||feather; wing}}. Probably also cognate with {{m|ja|歯|tr=ha||tooth}} from the way that both sprout and then later fall, and with {{m|ja|刃|tr=ha||blade}} from similarities in shape.

{{ja-pron|yomi=k|は|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

{{ja-noun|count=枚|は}}

{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|よう}}

From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=よう}} {{m|zh|葉|tr=yep||leaf}}.

{{ja-pron|yomi=o|よう|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

# an [[administration]]: the period of time during which a certain [[person]] holds a certain [[office]]
